resources.string: Call Guard - Cheek Hangups and Mute Blocker
Device Admin is not enabled. Please start Keep Screen Off from Home or the App Drawer and enable device admin so that the screen can be locked during calls.
Lock during phone call canceled since you did not enable admin access. Apps are not able to lock without admin access.
App only needs screen locking Device Admin rights. See the list below, no other control or privileges are granted by this.
